Sentencas: With (NH3H2O)-H-., (NH3H2O)-H-.-NH4HCO3 buffer solution and NaOH solution as coprecipitation agents, NiO-ZrO2, anode powder of solid oxide fuel cell, was synthesized by coprecipitation methods.
Titulo: Synthesis of NiO-ZrO2 powders for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Composition accuracy was analyzed by comparing the original composition with the mass of the eventually obtained powder.
Titulo: Synthesis of NiO-ZrO2 powders for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: It was shown that cubic NiO and cubic YSZ with a cascade powder distribution were obtained after the powder was calcined for 1h at different temperatures.
Titulo: Synthesis of NiO-ZrO2 powders for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Composition analysis of the powder synthesized with (NH3H2O)-H-.
Titulo: Synthesis of NiO-ZrO2 powders for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: as coprecipitation agent showed that NiO-YSZ powder greatly deviated from the original composition due to the loss of Ni2+ in the form of [Ni(NH3)(4)](2+).
Titulo: Synthesis of NiO-ZrO2 powders for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: When (NH3H2O)-H-.-NH4HCO3 buffer solution was used, productive output of nickel was increased.
Titulo: Synthesis of NiO-ZrO2 powders for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The loss of nickel can be totally avoided and better control of the powder composition could be realized when NaOH was used as coprecipitation agent.
Titulo: Synthesis of NiO-ZrO2 powders for solid oxide fuel cells
